targets.query:
from(bucket: "multisma2")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "ac_measurements" and r._field == "power" and r._inverter == "site")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _time: r._time, _field: "site", "Site": r._value }))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: max, createEmpty: false, column: "Site")
  |> drop(columns: ["_start", "_stop", "_field"])

from(bucket: "multisma2")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "ac_measurements" and r._field == "power" and r._inverter == "sb71")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _time: r._time, _field: "sb71", "SB71": r._value }))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false, column: "SB71")
  |> drop(columns: ["_start", "_stop", "_field"])

from(bucket: "multisma2")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "ac_measurements" and r._field == "power" and r._inverter == "sb72")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _time: r._time, _field: "sb72", "SB72": r._value }))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false, column: "SB72")
  |> drop(columns: ["_start", "_stop", "_field"])

from(bucket: "multisma2")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "ac_measurements" and r._field == "power" and r._inverter == "sb51")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _time: r._time, _field: "sb51", "SB51": r._value }))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false, column: "SB51")
  |> drop(columns: ["_start", "_stop", "_field"])

from(bucket: "multisma2")
  |> range(start: -15m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "ac_measurements" and r._field == "power")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._inverter == "site")
  |> last()

from(bucket: "multisma2")
  |> range(start: -15m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => (r._measurement == "ac_measurements" or r._measurement == "dc_measurements") and r._field == "power" and r._inverter == "site" )
  |> last()
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_measurement"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _time: r._time, "Site":
      if not exists r.dc_measurements or r.dc_measurements == 0.0 then 0.0
      else if not exists r.ac_measurements or r.ac_measurements == 0.0 then 0.0
      else float(v: r.ac_measurements) / float(v: r.dc_measurements) * 100.0 } ))

from(bucket: "multisma2")
  |> range(start: -15m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => (r._measurement == "ac_measurements" or r._measurement == "dc_measurements") and r._field == "power" and r._inverter == "sb71" )
  |> last()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _time: r._time, _measurement: r._measurement, _value: r._value}))
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_measurement"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _time: r._time, "SB71": 
      if not exists r.dc_measurements or r.dc_measurements == 0.0 then 0.0
      else if not exists r.ac_measurements or r.ac_measurements == 0.0 then 0.0
      else float(v: r.ac_measurements) / float(v: r.dc_measurements) * 100.0 } ))

from(bucket: "multisma2")
  |> range(start: -15m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => (r._measurement == "ac_measurements" or r._measurement == "dc_measurements") and r._field == "power" and r._inverter == "sb72" )
  |> last()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _time: r._time, _measurement: r._measurement, _value: r._value}))
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_measurement"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _time: r._time, "SB72": 
      if not exists r.dc_measurements or r.dc_measurements == 0.0 then 0.0
      else if not exists r.ac_measurements or r.ac_measurements == 0.0 then 0.0
      else float(v: r.ac_measurements) / float(v: r.dc_measurements) * 100.0 } ))

from(bucket: "multisma2")
  |> range(start: -15m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => (r._measurement == "ac_measurements" or r._measurement == "dc_measurements") and r._field == "power" and r._inverter == "sb51" )
  |> last()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _time: r._time, _measurement: r._measurement, _value: r._value}))
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_measurement"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _time: r._time, "SB51": 
      if not exists r.dc_measurements or r.dc_measurements == 0.0 then 0.0
      else if not exists r.ac_measurements or r.ac_measurements == 0.0 then 0.0
      else float(v: r.ac_measurements) / float(v: r.dc_measurements) * 100.0 } ))

from(bucket: "multisma2")
  |> range(start: -1d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "production" and r._inverter == "site" and r._field == "today")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _time: r._time, _kwh: (float(v: r._value) * 1.0) }))

from(bucket: "multisma2")
  |> range(start: -32d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "production" and r._inverter == "site" and r._field == "month")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _time: r._time, _kwh: (float(v: r._value) * 1.0) }))

from(bucket: "multisma2")
  |> range(start: -370d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "production" and r._inverter == "site" and r._field == "year")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _time: r._time, _mwh: (float(v: r._value) * 0.001) }))

from(bucket: "multisma2")
  |> range(start: -4h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "production" and r._inverter== "site" and r._field == "total_wh")
  |> last()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _time: r._time, _mwh: (float(v: r._value) * 0.000001) }))

from(bucket: "multisma2")
  |> range(start: -15m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "sun" and r._field== "elevation")
  |> last()

from(bucket: "multisma2")
  |> range(start: -15m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "sun" and r._field== "azimuth")
  |> last()

from(bucket: "multisma2")
  |> range(start: -1d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "production" and r._inverter == "site" and r._field == "today")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _time: r._time, _kgco2e: (float(v: r._value) * 0.18991) }))

from(bucket: "multisma2")
  |> range(start: -1d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "production" and r._inverter== "site" and r._field == "total_wh")
  |> last()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: (float(v: r._value) * 0.001 * 0.18991 * 0.001) }))

from(bucket: "multisma2")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "production" and r._inverter == "site" and r._field == "total_wh")
  |> elapsed(unit: 1s)
  |> difference(nonNegative: true, columns: ["_value"])
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._value > 0)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _time: r._time, "Actual Production": (float(v: r._value) * 3600.0 / float(v: r.elapsed)) }))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: max, createEmpty: false, column: "Actual Production")
  |> drop(columns: ["_start", "_stop", "_field"])

from(bucket: "multisma2")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "sun" and r._field == "irradiance")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _time: r._time, "Clearsky Potential": (r._value * float(v: ${panel_area}) * float(v: ${panel_efficiency})) }))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false, column: "Clearsky Potential")
  |> drop(columns: ["_start", "_stop", "_field"])

from(bucket: "multisma2")
  |> range(start: -4h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "status" and r._field == "operating_status" and r._inverter == "sb71")
  |> sample(n:1, pos: 0)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _time: r._time, _field: "sb71", _value: r._value }))

from(bucket: "multisma2")
  |> range(start: -4h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "status" and r._field == "operating_status" and r._inverter == "sb72")
  |> sample(n:1, pos: 0)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _time: r._time, _field: "sb72", _value: r._value }))

from(bucket: "multisma2")
  |> range(start: -4h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "status" and r._field == "operating_status" and r._inverter == "sb51")
  |> sample(n:1, pos: 0)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _time: r._time, _field: "sb51", _value: r._value }))

from(bucket: "multisma2")
  |> range(start: -13mo)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "production" and r._inverter == "site" and r._field == "month")
  |> limit(n:12, offset: 0)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _time: r._time, "Previous Month": r._value }))

from(bucket: "multisma2")
  |> range(start: -1mo)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "production" and r._inverter == "site" and r._field == "month")
  |> last()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _time: r._time, "Current Month": r._value }))

from(bucket: "multisma2")
  |> range(start: -31d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "production" and r._inverter == "site" and r._field == "today")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _time: r._time, "Production": r._value }))

from(bucket: "multisma2")
  |> range(start: -61d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "production" and r._inverter == "site" and r._field == "today")
  |> movingAverage(n: 30)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _time: r._time, "Moving Average": r._value }))

from(bucket: "multisma2")
  |> range(start: -4h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "status" and r._field == "condition" and r._inverter == "sb71")
  |> sample(n:1, pos: 0)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _time: r._time, _field: "sb71", _value: r._value }))

from(bucket: "multisma2")
  |> range(start: -4h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "status" and r._field == "condition" and r._inverter == "sb72")
  |> sample(n:1, pos: 0)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _time: r._time, _field: "sb72", _value: r._value }))

from(bucket: "multisma2")
  |> range(start: -4h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "status" and r._field == "condition" and r._inverter == "sb51")
  |> sample(n:1, pos: 0)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _time: r._time, _field: "sb51", _value: r._value }))

from(bucket: "multisma2")
  |> range(start: -4h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "status" and r._field == "derating" and r._inverter == "sb71")
  |> sample(n:1, pos: 0)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _time: r._time, _field: "sb71", _value: r._value }))

from(bucket: "multisma2")
  |> range(start: -4h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "status" and r._field == "derating" and r._inverter == "sb72")
  |> sample(n:1, pos: 0)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _time: r._time, _field: "sb72", _value: r._value }))

from(bucket: "multisma2")
  |> range(start: -4h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "status" and r._field == "derating" and r._inverter == "sb51")
  |> sample(n:1, pos: 0)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ _time: r._time, _field: "sb51", _value: r._value }))

list.description: Area of solar panels in square meters
list.label: Panel Area
list.name: panel_area

list.description: Panel efficiency is the fraction of solar radiation converted to power
list.label: Panel Efficiency
list.name: panel_efficiency
